issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.build and install KS using master 1.8.0
2.Platform > Clipboard
3.enter text into top field
4. Tap copy
5.Taop into the bottom text field and tap copy
6.hit back button 2X, once to dimiss keyboard,once to go back to test list

results:the test list loads, and some strange redraw happens before the app crashes.

Pastie:http://pastie.org/2613024
fields.summary: Android - G2 Only: crash when exiting clipboard test case
fields.environment: Goes back to 1.7.2 at least. NOPts een on any other device (droid1, droid 3, lg experience, htc hero, 3.0 pads)

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
